articles.author: John Menzies
articles.title: Vinicius Junior masterclass at Copa America, Paraguay coach criticises Real Madrid star – “The referee has to…” - Football Espana
articles.description: Vinicius Junior was heavy criticised for his poor performance during Brazil’s 0-0 draw with Costa Rica on MD1 of the 2024 Copa America. The 23-year-old answered back in fine style on Saturday morning. Vinicius scored twice, and won MOTM, as Brazil defeated Pa…
articles.content: Vinicius Junior was heavy criticised for his poor performance during Brazils 0-0 draw with Costa Rica on MD1 of the 2024 Copa America. The 23-year-old answered back in fine style on Saturday morning.… [+1420 chars]
